lender.name: Brandi

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Sometimes the problems of the world seem so insurmountable! Kiva allows me to make a drop in the bucket, in increments I can afford, with people who are not just looking for a handout but a way to improve their lives through their own hard work.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: Being lucky enough to be born in a wealthy nation should not be the condition that decides the success of aspirations.
lender.occupational_info: I research and implement computer based technology for an entertainment company.

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: I want to help!

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: One morning, the tide descends on a beach littered with thousands of star fish, and a woman is picking up starfish and returning them to the water one by one. A man walks by and comments on the impossible task. You can't possibly save them all, it's too late, most will perish, why are you doing this? She replies because it makes a difference to the ones I return to the water.

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: I understand how hard it can be to be successful when starting from little.
lender.occupational_info: I write programs, the instructions that tell computers what to do.

lender.name: Rachel

lender.occupational_info: No matter what your profession, you will inevitably become a teacher. I prefer more involvement and much faster results therefore I coach.

lender.occupational_info: I manage a service for a very large company, but my husband and I also own a beauty salon and we also raise cattle.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: Used to make loans because I felt it made a meaningful difference in the borrowers lives and helped them, at least slightly, extricate themselves from a life of poverty. Now I plan to quit Kiva and never loan again because I do not believe debt finance is a fair and compassionate method to help the world's poorer entrepreneurs. I do not want undue burdens to be placed on the borrowers should their plan not work out. I suggest others do the same so more do not end up like many of the borrowers of Grameen bank in India.
lender.occupational_info: I count beans and do paperwork.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I am here because someone reached out to me, just repaying the favor.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who have gotten in trouble with the Police, or Drugs.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I interview and hire people to provide services that help people change and rebuild their lives. Through a variety of services we work with children, families and refugees.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner. It is very rewarding to help others around the world by providing funds for their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: My company publishes books, and also helps authors self-publish their books.

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.loan_because: If we can have good enough lives to loan to other people, then we should make other peoples lives as good.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: I have been given much (Moroni 7:13)

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I believe every person deserves a shot at success no matter where they are. I am by no means rich but by many other countries standards I have a good deal of money. I am fortunate to have been born under a country whos currency carries a great deal of value around the world. It is because of this that I believe many should take up the call to help those struggling around the world. Everyone can help even if its only a little bit; what is a small sum of money in America can help power a bright future for those in developing countries. I can't think of a better cause for spending than helping those in need everywhere.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I do camera work and lighting for movies.

lender.name: Matthew

lender.occupational_info: I am activley training to become a martial arts instructor with hopes of someday opening an academy of my own.

lender.name: adele
lender.loan_because: it's easy, it's right, it's important.

lender.name: Kimber
lender.loan_because: We are not alone in the world and we all can help, wherever help is needed, even if it's just a little. A little at a time adds up to a lot!
lender.occupational_info:
Hello! My name is Kimber and for many years now I have been a teacher in the Venice and Santa Monica area in Southern California. I recently started The Children's Caring and Sharing Community Project. I'm so excited that this program is now being incorporated as part of several local school's monthly curriculum and weekly lesson plans. Lending programs like KIVA are an important part of this positive social caring project.
We hope to inspire children to be active participants in their communities. And isn't the world one large community?
Children are generous by nature and are starting to be proactive and fire up amazing changes on their own. Children of all ages are really wanting to help and are looking for ways to make a powerful impact. Kiva is perfect! With the help of their families and their community, just imagine what they can do!
Growing, sharing, learning, loving and giving are all part of what we want to instill and support in our children. And this is a great place to help teach those lessons -- by helping other people around the world. It starts with us!
Love Always - Kimber Luederitz

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Everyone should get a chance to try and better themselves and their community

lender.name: Sophia
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur that came here to the U.S. from Vietnam. I was blessed to be given such opportunities in this country and I want to pay it forward so that others will have the opportunity to take care of their family and community and continue to pay it forward. It blesses everyone's lives around them too.
lender.occupational_info: I do business on a computer.

lender.loan_because: I like giving as much support as I can to such an awesome project. Also, I have more than a little residual guilt over the war in Afghanistan, being an American.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student, and invested some of my pocket money from a job working at a restaurant as a short order cook.

lender.occupational_info: I am in graduate school--hoping someday (soon!) to be a university professor, teaching Russian language and literature to interested students.

lender.occupational_info: Give a man a fish and he eats for a day. Teach him to fish and he eats forever.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I admire people who strive to improve their circumstance and I have the means to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help to develop consumers products that improve lives.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are sick or injured to regain their strength and ability to be independent

lender.name: Christen
lender.loan_because: I was brought up to help the world, but usually seeing all efforts never actually make it to the people that need it, so through KIVA I can choose whom I give a loan and actually see it being use. Everyone needs a chance to succeed in this world, and I am glad that I can help with people's dreams.

lender.name: David & Cassandra
lender.loan_because: We are very fortunate to be Canadian. We help because we can, and everyone who can, should.
lender.occupational_info: David is an Apple computer consultant. Cassandra attends University taking her Bachelor of Science.

lender.name: Zac
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people follow their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I work in the film/TV industry

lender.name: Brian
lender.occupational_info: Professional Inventor and Entrepreneur

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital fixing computers, printers, monitors and other miscellaneous technical issues that arise from day to day. I also am in charge of purchasing technology and distributing it throughout the hospital.

lender.name: Afua
lender.loan_because: I believe in UBUNTU.
lender.occupational_info: I hand make African inspired jewelry

lender.name: JP Lindsey II
lender.loan_because: I think
lender.occupational_info: Life is Good

lender.name: Lenore
lender.loan_because: I can. Every little bit helps.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: business is a language we all understand, I want to help people do business

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I have always loved microcredit since I read the book by Muhammad Yunus. I believe this is one of the greatest ways to lead people out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their stock market investing to make sure they are on track for retirement.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: We are all connected in this world. I lend a hand to my brothers and sisters.
lender.occupational_info: By day I am a concierge. I help people who are visiting New York City find tickets to the theater and good places to eat. By night I am a writer. I am currently working on a Broadway musical.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.occupation: Support worker. I teach people with dissabilities

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a terrific idea..

lender.name: Scott Kopec
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people. I help them have feel better. I help sore bodies and find ways to improve there way of life, by having less pain.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: we can all make a small difference in this world
lender.occupational_info: I work in the housing industry

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone an opportunity they may not have had otherwise.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I want my students to know that they can make a difference in the world and help people living in poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Each day I interact with children ages 5-12 when they visit the media center in the elementary school I teach at. We share literature and engage in a variety of projects that incorporate technology.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: it's fun and feels good to support others in our global community!

lender.name: Jane&Joel
lender.loan_because: The best place to find a helping hand is at the end of your own arm
lender.occupational_info: Be the change you want to see in the world. - Mahatma Gandhi -

lender.name: Craig
lender.occupation: Houston movers driver for Houston moving companies
lender.loan_because: I loan because I love being able to help others start their own businesses. Especially those who have a good idea but need others to make it possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am a driver in Houston Texas for moving companies. I drive for apartment movers mostly. There is the occasional office move but not very many.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: Others need the money more than I do. It's time to give back what I have been given.

lender.name: Nate & Mia
lender.loan_because: We want to help people be able to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am Studying city planning and economic development at San Diego State University. Mia works for PricewaterhouseCoopers doing business development.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I feel it important to help struggling entrepreneurs, like myself.

lender.name: Sam
lender.occupation: I study ways to help improve people\'s lives

lender.name: Roy Steves
lender.loan_because: When the world economy improves, everyone prospers.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs and websites.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Gabe
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: every little helps!

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: you get what you give.

lender.name: Jenifer
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to have what I have and using a small portion of my resources to help others improve the lives of their families seems like a worthwhile thing to do with money.
lender.occupational_info: I make things in print look good, inviting to read, and inspire the reader to act.

lender.name: Mano
lender.loan_because: For Opening Browsing Center

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: God gave me a heart for helping others.
